original_text:
Her cities have become a horror,
    a land of drought and a desert,
a land in which no one dwells,
    and through which no son of man passes.
korean_text: 그 성읍들은 황폐하여 마른 땅과 사막과 사람이 살지 않는 땅이 되었으니 그리로 지나가는 사람이 없도다

sentences.original_text: Her cities have become a horror,
a land of drought and a desert,
a land in which no one dwells,
and through which no son of man passes.
